name: DROM (Wherry, MannyC, Evgeniy Morozov, Alex Baluh, Nick_UI)
name_original: DROM (Wherry, MannyC, Evgeniy Morozov, Alex Baluh, Nick_UI)
description:
Mechanics change every room - adapt and get through! 

In search of great treasures you’ve entered the Rubic’s Dungeon. Not everything is what it looks like in this tricky place. You must improvise to get through “howmany” deceptive levels that change the rules of the universe.

Discover and adapt!

Developers:

NICK_UI - game design

Alex Baluh - sound effects & music

Manuel - art

Wherry - programming

em5f - programming
